StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBADeleteSchools]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@dod varchar(20)
as
declare @schoolname varchar(40), @type char(20), @login varchar(15)
set @schoolname = (select highschool_name from high_school where dod_code = @dod)
select @type = CASE school_type WHEN 'CC' THEN 'Community College' ELSE 'High School' END from high_school where dod_code = @dod
set @login = (select system_user)
if exists (select 1 from high_school where dod_code = @dod)
begin update high_school set deleted = 'Y', user_login = @login, update_date = getdate() where dod_code = @dod
print 'The Deleted .ag was set to Y for ' + @schoolname + @type end
else begin
print @dod +' '+ 'is not a valid DOD Code'
end
